'''''Omnes Viae Remam Ducunt''''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Wonders of the World]]''. To complete this achievement, the player needs to complete {{Quest|The Last Day of Remuria}}.

==Trivia==
* The name of this achievement is a reference to the famous saying {{wt|all roads lead to Rome|"all roads lead to Rome"}} {{lang|la=omnes viae Romam ducunt}}, but with Remuria instead of Rome.
